name: Memerror
description:
This game was produced for the Inkubator Game Jam 2022 at Kingston University, by two 3d animators/generalists and one programmer. We did it in 48 hours.

Music is from Stars of the Night· Dynatron, and memes from various internet sources, including anime references (like Jojo) and edits.

Special appearance of CPR x Misery x Reese’s Puffs by Angie-Chan NekoBlue

This game was made as a parody without commercial motives.
